rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Vastu-aligned placement to welcome positive energy.
Open living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade for ample natural light, designed following Chettinad style with traditional motifs and luxury finishes.
Cozy dining space with Vastu-aligned positioning ensuring balanced energy flow; adjacent to the kitchen.
Modern yet traditional kitchen design incorporating elements from Chettinad architecture with cost-effective luxury finishes.
Two-car garage providing ample space for vehicles; designed with integrated utility access following local building norms.

openings.description: Large entryway door with robust construction ensuring security and ease of movement.
Balconies for each bedroom on the upper level; here designed to provide private outdoor access while adhering to Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light and ventilation for the living room and other rooms.
